name: androidmanagement_provisioningInfo_get
description: Get the device provisioning information by the identifier provided in the sign-in url.

name.description: Required. The identifier that Android Device Policy passes to the 3P sign-in page in the form of provisioningInfo/{provisioning_info}.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Information about a device that is available during setup.

$ul: **apiLevel**: The API level of the Android platform version running on the device.
**brand**: The brand of the device. For example, Google.
**enterprise**: The name of the enterprise in the form enterprises/{enterprise}.
**managementMode**: The management mode of the device or profile.
**model**: The model of the device. For example, Asus Nexus 7.
**name**: The name of this resource in the form provisioningInfo/{provisioning_info}.
